data.Name: Porifera
data.About:
Porifera has developed advanced membranes and systems for water treatment and product concentration. We are able to concentrates juices, wines, coffees, beverage products and other aqueous solutions, such as challenging wastewaters,  without pressure or heat. Porifera is able to achieve energy savings of up to 80% compared to conventional evaporators. For food and beverage products, our systems create natural, fresh tasting product concentrate that is true to its original taste, nutrient & color profile.

Our osmotic membrane technology is the lowest cost solution for producing high purity products from the most challenging sources. We have developed a proven, commercial technology that is poised to become a new industry standard.
